## OptionalKeys type

Get optional property keys of T.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type OptionalKeys<T> = {
  [K in keyof T]-?: {} extends Pick<T, K> ? K : never
}[Keys<T>]
```
<b>References:</b> [Keys](./types-kit.keys.md)

## Example


```ts
interface Props {
    a?: number
    readonly b: number
    c?: number
  }

  // Expect: 'a' | 'c'
  type PropKeys = OptionalKeys<Props>
```
